message: Let's start fair. I'll take 90%, you get 10%. Hope you'll see reason.
I'll give you a better deal, but I'm not going to give you everything. You can't expect me to be generous when you're being so greedy.
I'm willing to compromise, but I still need a larger share.  Let's split it 70/30.
I'm not going to give you 70%, that's ridiculous. I'll give you a slightly better deal, but you're still not getting most of it.
